I can't send a message to that channel.pt-br: Eu não consigo enviar mensagens para o canal no qual você executou o comando, por favor, avise aos donos do servidor.
I can't send a message to that channel.en: I can't send a message to the channel where you executed the command, please, tell the server staff.

That language doesn't exist or wasn't be.en: That language doesn't exist or wasn't been translated for this bot yet.

That's already the defined language for.pt-br: Essa já é a linguagem definida para esse servidor.
